resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/74136</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>74136</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40dad197-f55c-42f6-2072-e9abebd08cfe#1#1</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Virtuális múzeum</string>
            <string language="en">Virtual Museum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Virtuelles Museum</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Musée Virtuel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Museu Virtual</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Museo Virtuale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εικονικό μουσείο</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Museo Virtual</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Európa térképén a barbár népek vándorlása látható színes nyilak jelölik a mozgást, amit egy megjelenő évszámláló kísér.</string>
            <string language="en">The peregrination of the barbarous peoples can be seen on the map of Europe, coloured arrows show the moving that is accompanied by an appearing indicator</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Népvándorlás,  Germán,  vizigót,  osztrogót,  ír,  frank,  langobárd,  </string>
            <string language="en">imigration, German, water-goth, ostrogoth, Irish, Frank, Langobard  </string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Das peregrination der barbarous Völker kann auf 
die Karte von Europa, farbige Pfeile gesehen werden darstellen, daß 
bewegend das von einer erscheinenden Anzeige begleitet wird</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La pérégrination des peuples barbares peut être vue 
sur la carte de l'Europe, flèches colorées montrent que se 
déplaçant cela est accompagné d'un indicateur apparaissant</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O peregrination dos povos barbarous pode ser visto
no mapa de Europa, setas coloridas mostra que se movendo aquele está 
acompanhado por um indicador aparecendo</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il peregrination della gente barbarous può 
essere visto sul programma di Europa, frecce colorate mostra che 
muovendosi quello è accompagnato da un indicatore comparente</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η περιπλάνηση των βάρβαρων λαών μπορεί να 
δει στο χάρτη της Ευρώπης, τα χρωματισμένα βέλη 
εμφανίζουν την κίνηση που συνοδεύεται από έναν εμφανιμένος 
δείκτη</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El peregrination de la gente bárbara se puede 
ver en la correspondencia de Europa, flechas coloreadas muestra que 
moviéndose eso es acompañada por un indicador que aparece</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">imigration, Deutscher, Wasser-goth, ostrogoth, Iren, 
Freivermerk, Langobard</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">imigration, Allemand, l'eau-goth, ostrogoth, Irlandais, 
contreseing, Langobard</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">imigration, alemão, água-goth, ostrogoth, irish, 
franquia, Langobard</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">imigration, tedesco, acqua-goth, ostrogoth, Irlandese, 
firma di franchigia, Langobard</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">το imigration, γερμανικά, ύδωρ-γοτχ-ποτίζει, ostrogoth,
ιρλανδικά, Frank, Langobard</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">imigration, alemán, agua-goth, ostrogoth, irlandés, 
carta franca, Langobard</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>simulation</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Panem Kiadó
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>74136</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://sdt.sulinet.hu/Player/default.aspx?g=40dad197-f55c-42f6-2072-e9abebd08cfe&v=1&b=1</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
